meanings.definition: To have sexual intercourse with someone.
meanings.sent2: The couple shagged after their date.
meanings.sent3: The movie characters shagged behind the scenes.
meanings.sent4: The birds shagged in the trees, oblivious to onlookers.
meanings.sent5: The wolves shagged under the moonlight, their howls echoing.

meanings.definition: To be exhausted or worn out.
meanings.sent1: After the long hike, he was shagged.
meanings.sent2: She felt shagged after a day of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The tired puppy shagged on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The old car shagged along the road, barely moving.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner was shagged but proud of finishing the race.

meanings.definition: To have tangled or messy hair.
meanings.sent1: Her hair was shagged after the windy walk.
meanings.sent2: He woke up with shagged hair every morning.
meanings.sent3: The child's hair looked shagged after playing outside.
meanings.sent4: The lion's mane was shagged, giving it a wild look.
meanings.sent5: The witch's hair was shagged and full of twigs and leaves.
